notifications.title: Annual Wellness Visit Due
notifications.message: Hi Mary, you're due for your annual wellness visit which is fully covered by your Medicare Advantage Plan C. Schedule now to stay healthy!

notifications.title: Medication Refill Needed
notifications.message: Your Metformin prescription needs to be refilled soon. You have 1 refill remaining. Contact your pharmacy or request a refill through the app.

notifications.title: Complete Your Application
notifications.message: Robert, your Supplemental Coverage application is 65% complete. Just one more step - upload your income documentation to finish.

notifications.title: Upcoming Appointment Reminder
notifications.message: Your Cardiology Follow-up with Dr. James Chen is scheduled for December 10th at 2:00 PM at Portland Heart Institute.

notifications.title: New Benefit Available
notifications.message: Patricia, great news! Your plan now includes expanded vision coverage. Check out your new benefits.

notifications.title: Wellness Visit Overdue
notifications.message: James, it's been over a year since your last wellness visit. These visits are free and important for managing your health conditions. Schedule today!

notifications.title: Critical: Refill Your Albuterol Inhaler
notifications.message: Your Albuterol Inhaler has 0 refills remaining and expires soon. Contact your doctor immediately for a new prescription.

notifications.title: Part D Application Update
notifications.message: Your Part D Prescription Coverage application is waiting. Review plan options and select your coverage to save on medications.

notifications.title: Flu Shot Appointment Confirmed
notifications.message: Linda, your flu shot is scheduled for November 22nd at 3:30 PM at Denver Community Clinic. Fully covered!

notifications.title: Claim Processed
notifications.message: Your Annual Wellness Visit claim (CLM-2024-022) has been approved. $250 covered by your plan.

notifications.title: Diabetes Management Tip
notifications.message: Managing diabetes? Remember to check your blood sugar regularly and track your meals. Your Diabetes Management program offers free coaching!

notifications.title: Important Policy Update
notifications.message: Starting January 1st, your Medicare Advantage Plan B will include new telehealth benefits. Schedule virtual visits from home!
